German L. MATTHEWS, Claimant-Appellant, v. R. James NICHOLSON, Secretary of Veterans Affairs, Respondent-Appellee. No. 05-7183. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. April 6, 2006. Rehearing Denied April 27, 2006.

Before SCHALL, GAJARSA, and DYK, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

*111AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
